metadata.name: Okta FastPass Phishing Detection
metadata.comment: Detects when Okta FastPass prevents a known phishing site.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM user_access WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(status_detail) = lower('fastpass declined phishing attempt') AND lower(actor.authorizations.decision) = lower('failure') AND lower(action) = lower('user.authentication.auth_via_mfa'))

output.summary: Detects when Okta FastPass prevents a known phishing site.
